_metadata.description: Complete mob definitions with all numeric values decoded

terrain.description: Terrain types where mobs can spawn

attack_effects.description: Special effects that can be applied on hit

spell_types.description: Types of spells mobs can cast

_field_documentation.name: Singular name
_field_documentation.morale: Chance mob will flee when damaged (0-100, lower = more likely to flee)

combat.hit_dice: Number of hit dice for HP calculation

general_attack.max_damage: Maximum damage per hit (0 if using weapon_type)
general_attack.uses_weapon_type: If true, damage is determined by weapon_type
general_attack.attack_effect: Special effect on hit (poison, paralysis, etc.)

special_attack.chance_percent: Percent chance to use special attack

mobs.name: strangle vine
mobs.description: The strangle vine is a large bulbous plant with several writhing vines sprouting from it. It moves slowly about on gnarled roots.

mobs.name: white orchid
mobs.description: The white orchid stands about two feet tall, moving around on its thin tendrils.

mobs.name: pink orchid
mobs.description: The pink orchid stands about three feet tall, moving around on its thin tendrils.

mobs.name: red orchid
mobs.description: The red orchid stands over three feet tall, moving around on its thin tendrils.

mobs.name: yellow orchid
mobs.description: The yellow orchid stands about four feet tall, moving around on its thin tendrils.

mobs.name: black orchid
mobs.description: The black orchid stands over four feet tall, moving around on its sticky tendrils.

mobs.name: constrictor ivy
mobs.description: The constrictor ivy is a long snake-like vine, slithering about in search of food.

mobs.name: carrion creeper
mobs.description: The carrion creeper is a knotted mass of thorny vines which writhes about chaotically. You detect the fetid odor of rotting flesh, and notice several small animal carcasses tangled within this vile aberration.

mobs.name: reaper shrub
mobs.description: The reaper shrub is a squat thorny plant, moving slowly about on thick gnarled roots. Its spiney branches rustle ominously at your presence.

mobs.name: huge rat
mobs.description: The huge rat resembles rats you've seen before, except that it is about two feet tall at the shoulder, and seems much more aggressive.

mobs.name: imp
mobs.description: The imp is a tiny humanoid with pointed ears and bright red skin. It stands just over two feet in height and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: female kobold
mobs.description: The kobold is a small humanoid with doglike facial features and is covered with coarse body hair. She stands just over three feet in height, is wearing a filthy tunic, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: kobold
mobs.description: The kobold is a small humanoid with doglike facial features and is covered with coarse body hair. He stands just under four feet in height, is wearing a filthy tunic, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: female orc
mobs.description: The orc is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. She stands just over four feet in height, is wearing a leather tunic, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: orc
mobs.description: The orc is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just under five feet in height, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: skeleton warrior
mobs.description: The skeleton warrior is wearing tattered armor and mouldering bits of old clothing, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: giant scorpion
mobs.description: The giant scorpion resembles a common scorpion, except that it is over eight feet in length.

mobs.name: zombie
mobs.description: The zombie has a blank expression on its face. It is wearing old soiled clothing, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: huge toad
mobs.description: The huge toad resembles a common toad, except that it is just over three feet tall, and seems very agressive.

mobs.name: giant slug
mobs.description: The giant slug is over seven feet long and drools acidic spittle from its maw.

special_attack.description: discharged a spray of acid at

mobs.name: giant bat
mobs.description: The giant bat has a wingspan of over twelve feet and has wicked looking claws and teeth.

mobs.name: lesser demoness
mobs.description: The lesser demoness is a spindly bipedal humanoid with light yellowish skin and wicked claws and teeth. She stands about five feet tall and fixes you with a baleful stare.

mobs.name: lesser demon
mobs.description: The lesser demon is a spindly bipedal humanoid with dark yellowish skin and wicked claws and teeth. He stands about five feet tall and fixes you with a baleful stare.

mobs.name: shade
mobs.description: The shade is a dark shadowy figure. You can tell very little about it except that its eyes strongly resemble burning coals. It occasionally emits a low moan and watches your movements closely.

mobs.name: giant spider
mobs.description: The giant spider's body is over six feet long, and it has thick hairy legs. A thick oily liquid drips from its mandibles.

mobs.name: ram
mobs.description: The ram glares at you from beneath a pair of huge curved horns.

mobs.name: fire beetle
mobs.description: The fire beetle is a huge reddish brown beetle, about four feet long, with a thick shiny carapace, and strong, wickedly sharp mandibles.

mobs.name: alligator
mobs.description: The alligator watches your every move closely and snaps at you.

mobs.name: giant asp
mobs.description: The giant asp is an enormous viper over twenty feet in length. Its scales are a dull tan and it's body is thicker than a large man's arm.

mobs.name: anaconda
mobs.description: The anaconda is an enormous constrictor snake well over forty feet in length. Its scales range in color from an emerald green to a dark blue, and its body is thicker than some tree trunks you've seen.

mobs.name: lizard woman
mobs.description: The lizard woman is a five foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. She has greyish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. The lizard woman is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard man
mobs.description: The lizard man is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. The lizard man is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: black bear
mobs.description: The black bear has shaggy black fur run through with reddish brown streaks and stands well over four feet tall at the shoulder.

mobs.name: red bear
mobs.description: The red bear has shaggy reddish fur run through with black streaks and stands just over five feet tall at the shoulder.

mobs.name: female gnoll
mobs.description: The gnoll is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick golden brown body hair. She stands just over six feet in height, is wearing a leather cuirass and trousers, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll
mobs.description: The gnoll is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just under seven feet in height, is wearing a chainmail shirt and trousers, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: female hobgoblin
mobs.description: The hobgoblin is a squat apelike humanoid with dark skin and pointed ears. She stands just under five feet tall, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: hobgoblin
mobs.description: The hobgoblin is a squat apelike humanoid with dark skin and pointed ears. He stands just over five feet tall, is wearing a leather cuirass, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: female brigand
mobs.description: The brigand has the look of a common thief, and is dressed in a cheap, but flashy outfit. She is also wearing leather armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: brigand
mobs.description: The brigand has the look of a common thief, and is dressed in a cheap, but flashy outfit. He is also wearing chain armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: leopard
mobs.description: The leopard has luxurious looking spotted fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

mobs.name: wolf
mobs.description: The wolf is very large and has greyish fur and icey blue eyes. It growls at you menacingly and bares its teeth.

mobs.name: wild boar
mobs.description: The wild boar has dark coarse hair and makes a low whining sound. It has two sharp tusks which curve upwards from the sides of its mouth.

mobs.name: cave bear
mobs.description: The cave bear has dark brown fur and stands well over seven feet tall at the shoulder. Its teeth and claws gleam like daggers as it sizes you up.

mobs.name: female barbarian
mobs.description: The barbarian is dressed in the hides of furred animals, and is armed with {0} {1}. She has a look of great strength and cunning.

mobs.name: barbarian
mobs.description: The barbarian is dressed in the hides of furred animals, and is armed with {0} {1}. He has a look of great strength and cunning.

mobs.name: female centaur
mobs.description: The centaur has the body of a horse with the upper torso, arms, and head of a well built woman. She has long hair which she wears in a tight braid, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: centaur
mobs.description: The centaur has the body of a horse with the upper torso, arms, and head of a well muscled man. He has long hair which he wears in a tight braid, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: mountain ape
mobs.description: The mountain ape is nearly seven feet tall, has thick reddish brown fur and looks very strong.

mobs.name: female satyr
mobs.description: The satyr has the upper torso of well built woman, and the lower torso, legs, and hooves of a goat. She is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: satyr
mobs.description: The satyr has the upper torso of man with a lot of body hair, and the lower torso, legs, and hooves of a goat. He is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: female minotaur
mobs.description: The minotaur has the upper torso of a muscular woman, and the head, legs, and hooves of a bull. She is wearing ringmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: minotaur
mobs.description: The minotaur has the upper torso of a muscular man, and the head, legs, and hooves of a bull. He is wearing ringmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: carrion crane
mobs.description: The carrion crane is nearly eight feet tall, has dull grey plumage and a very wicked looking hooked ebony beak.

mobs.name: ogress
mobs.description: The ogress resembles an enormous and very ugly woman. She stands over seven feet tall and is very muscular. Her clothing is filthy and poorly made. She is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: ogre
mobs.description: The ogre resembles an enormous and very ugly man. He stands over eight feet tall and is very muscular. His clothing is filthy and poorly made. He is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: swordswoman
mobs.description: The swordswoman has an air of confidance about her. She is wearing chain armor, and is armed with a rapier which she wields skillfully.

mobs.name: swordsman
mobs.description: The swordsman has an air of confidance about him. He is wearing chain armor, and is armed with a rapier which he wields skillfully.

mobs.name: female cyclops
mobs.description: The cyclops resembles a very large woman with only one eye in the center of her forehead. She stands over eleven feet tall, and is armed with a spiked club.

mobs.name: cyclops
mobs.description: The cyclops resembles a very large man with only one eye in the center of his forehead. He stands over twelve feet tall, and is armed with a spiked club.

mobs.name: wraith
mobs.description: The wraith is a shadowy figure with faded, nondescript features. It is semi-transparent and greyish in color. It glares at you with dull yellowish eyes.

mobs.name: larochess
mobs.description: The larochess resembles a large well built woman with pale bluish skin pointed ears, and a short tail. She is very muscular and stands nearly nine feet tall. She is wearing leather armor, and is armed with a wicked spear.

special_attack.description: exhaled a cloud of acidic vapor at

mobs.name: larochet
mobs.description: The larochet resembles a large well built man with dark bluish skin, pointed ears, and a short tail. He is very muscular and stands over nine feet tall. He is wearing a cuirass, and is armed with a wicked spear.

special_attack.description: exhaled a cloud of acidic vapor at

mobs.name: cave lion
mobs.description: The cave lion is a huge black animal which stands over six feet tall at the shoulder and has wicked curved claws and razor sharp teeth.

mobs.name: female troll
mobs.description: The troll resembles a large ugly woman with yellowish green skin and wicked claws. Her skin is covered with warts and tufts of stiff greenish hair.

mobs.name: troll
mobs.description: The troll resembles a large ugly man with brownish green skin and wicked claws. His skin is covered with warts and tufts of stiff greenish hair.

mobs.name: skeleton lord
mobs.description: The skeleton lord wears a suit well kept chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: griffon
mobs.description: The griffon has the body of a lion, and the front feet, head, and wings of an eagle. It has razor sharp talons and a large black beak.

mobs.name: ghoul
mobs.description: The ghoul is a lithe, though muscular humanoid with tightly drawn brownish flesh and cloven hooves. Its teeth and nails are yellowish and look very sharp.

mobs.name: gargoyle
mobs.description: The gargoyle is a heavily muscled, grey skinned humanoid with large leathery wings and wicked claws.

mobs.name: magmaman
mobs.description: The magmaman resembles a humanoid non-descript creature, seemingly formed from molten rock. He has two thick arm-like appendages, ending in dripping claws.

mobs.name: ogress mage
mobs.description: The ogress mage is wearing a steel breastplate and bracers, and is armed with {0} {1}. She is also wearing a dark red cloak.

mobs.name: ogre mage
mobs.description: The ogre mage is wearing a steel breastplate and bracers, and is armed with {0} {1}. He is also wearing a dark red cloak.

mobs.name: sand worm
mobs.description: The sand worm is over fifty feet long, is covered in a hard ringed carapace, it's gaping maw is filled with many rows of wickedly gleaming teeth.

mobs.name: chimera
mobs.description: The chimera has the body of a lion, leathery wings and two heads which resemble those of a dragon. Thin streams of smoke curl upwards from its nostrils.

mobs.name: warlock
mobs.description: The warlock is dressed in red robes and radiates power. He wields a staff shrouded in magical flame. Tatooed on his right forearm is a crimson sigil.

mobs.name: minotaur chieftain
mobs.description: The minotaur chieftain is a very large member of his species. He is very muscular and stands nearly eight feet tall. He is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: stone giantess
mobs.description: The stone giantess resembles a huge hairless woman with light greyish skin and stands nearly eighteen feet tall. She is armed with a huge club.

mobs.name: stone giant
mobs.description: The stone giant resembles a huge hairless man with dark greyish skin and stands nearly twenty feet tall. He is armed with a huge club.

mobs.name: elysian dragon
mobs.description: The elysian dragon has metalic sky blue scales which glisten in the light. Its powerful wings span some eighty feet and it is over fifty feet in length.

mobs.name: hydra
mobs.description: The hydra resembles a small wingless dragon with three heads.

special_attack.description: expelled a ball of fire at

mobs.name: female affreet
mobs.description: The affreet resembles a huge horned woman with reddish skin and stands well over eighteen feet tall. She is armed with a greatsword that glows dull red.

special_attack.description: discharged a cloud of flame at

mobs.name: affreet
mobs.description: The affreet resembles a huge horned man with reddish skin and stands well over twenty feet tall. He is armed with a greatsword that glows dull red.

special_attack.description: discharged a cloud of flame at

mobs.name: magma worm
mobs.description: The magma worm is over seventy feet long, is covered in a hard ringed carapace that glows a dull reddish color, and it's gaping maw is filled with many rows of wicked teeth.

mobs.name: stygian dragon
mobs.description: The stygian dragon has dull brown scales and is without wings. It is well over eighty feet in length. Its talons are as large and probably as sharp as a sword.

mobs.name: ice giantess
mobs.description: The ice giantess resembles a huge woman with bone white skin, and long flowing white hair. She stands over nineteen feet tall, and is armed with a huge crystaline sword.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of frost at

mobs.name: ice giant
mobs.description: The ice giant resembles a huge man with bone white skin, white hair, and a long white beard. He stands over twenty feet tall, and is armed with a huge crystaline sword.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of frost at

mobs.name: octopod
mobs.description: The octopod is a huge dark green bulbus plant standing nearly five feet tall, and has eight rubbery greenish tentacles.

mobs.name: skeleton giant
mobs.description: The skeleton giant stands nearly twenty feet tall, is armed with a bone hammer, and is wearing an enormous suit of tattered chainmail.

mobs.name: greater demoness
mobs.description: The greater demoness emanates power and malevolence. She has bright blue skin and stands over eight feet tall. She wields a flaming greatsword and wears an armband engraved with runes.

mobs.name: greater demon
mobs.description: The greater demon emanates power and malevolence. He has dull blue skin and stands over nine feet tall. He wields a flaming greatsword and wears an armband engraved with runes.

mobs.name: sorceress
mobs.description: The sorceress is dressed in indigo robes and radiates power. She wields a rod tipped with magical frost. Inscribed on her forehead is a blue rune.

mobs.name: sorceror
mobs.description: The sorceror is dressed in indigo robes and radiates power. He wields a rod shrouded with magical flame. Inscribed on his forehead is a violet rune.

mobs.name: apollyon dragon
mobs.description: The apollyon dragon has crimson scales and powerful leathery wings. It is without a doubt one of the most enormous creatures you have ever seen, being well over one hundred feet in length. Its talons and teeth are jet black, and smoke curls upwards from its nostrils.

mobs.name: flame giantess
mobs.description: The flame giantess resembles a huge woman with ruddy skin and bright red hair. She stands over twenty five feet tall, is armed with a great axe made of a dull black metal, and wears dragonscale armor. She reguards you malignly with her smouldering red eyes, and smiles cruely.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

mobs.name: flame giant
mobs.description: The flame giant resembles a huge man with ruddy skin, bright red hair, and a coarse red beard. He stands nearly thirty feet tall, is armed with a great axe made of a dull black metal, and wears dragonscale armor. He regards you malevolently with his smouldering red eyes, and grins wickedly.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

mobs.name: flame giant warlord
mobs.description: The flame giant resembles a huge man with ruddy skin, bright red hair, and a coarse red beard. He stands nearly thirty feet tall, is armed with a great spear made of a dark black metal that glows with a dull reddish light at the head. He wears armor of fine workmanship made from overlapping scales of a dark metallic blue. You sense great wisdom in his stern gaze.

special_attack.description: exhaled a blast of flame at

mobs.name: balneal dragon
mobs.description: The balneal dragon has silvery blue scales and a powerfully built serpentine body. It is over one hundred fifty feet in length. Its talons and teeth are of a clear bluish crystaline substance, and steam rises from its nostrils.

mobs.name: arch demoness
mobs.description: The arch demoness emanates awesome power and malevolence. She has bright red skin and stands over twelve feet tall. She wields a glowing bardiche and wears an armband engraved with runes.

mobs.name: arch demon
mobs.description: The arch demon emanates awesome power and malevolence. He has dull blue skin and stands over fifteen feet tall. He wields a glowing bardiche and wears an armband engraved with runes.

mobs.name: demon king
mobs.description: The demon king emanates incredible power and horrific malevolence. He has dull black skin and stands over thirty feet tall. He wields a huge glowing sabre nearly fifteen feet long and wears a dull grey crown engraved with runes.

special_attack.description: discharged a blast of dark energy at

mobs.name: great dragon
mobs.description: The great dragon has greyish scales and powerful leathery wings. It is without a doubt the most enormous creature you have ever seen, being well over two hundred feet in length. Its talons and teeth are yellowish white, and smoke curls upward from its nostrils as it regards you with amusement.

special_ability.description: breathed flames in a great arc
special_ability.name: Spells

mobs.name: white rabbit
mobs.description: The white rabbit is large and fluffy with floppy ears and big brown eyes.

mobs.name: black rabbit
mobs.description: The black rabbit is large and fluffy with floppy ears and big brown eyes.

mobs.name: pink bunny
mobs.description: The pink bunny is small and fluffy with perky ears and big blue eyes.

special_attack.description: gnashed its big pointy teeth at

special_ability.description: becomes a berzerk flurry of gnashing teeth
special_ability.name: Attack All and Tumble

mobs.name: lizard
mobs.description: The lizard is small and brown and moves very quickly.

mobs.name: monkey
mobs.description: The monkey is quick and playful and watches you warily.

mobs.name: owl
mobs.description: The owl is perched in a nearby tree watching you intently.

mobs.name: squirrel
mobs.description: The squirrel sits in a nearby tree and chitters at you.

mobs.name: frog
mobs.description: The frog is small and green and appears to be a good jumper.

mobs.name: lizard
mobs.description: The lizard is small and purple and moves very quickly.

mobs.name: fox
mobs.description: The fox hides in the nearby brush and seems very skittish.

mobs.name: hyena
mobs.description: The hyena looks ravenous and extremely viscious. It snarls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

mobs.name: tiger
mobs.description: The tiger has luxurious looking striped fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

mobs.name: mountain lion
mobs.description: The mountain lion has dark brown spotted fur. It growls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

mobs.name: female nomad
mobs.description: The nomad has dark skin and the look of someone hardened by the harsh environment in which she lives. She is wearing dark linen clothing and is armed with a scimitar.

mobs.name: nomad
mobs.description: The nomad has dark skin and the look of someone hardened by the harsh environment in which he lives. He is wearing dark linen clothing and is armed with a scimitar.

mobs.name: female bandit
mobs.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a rich red color. She is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

mobs.name: bandit
mobs.description: The bandit has the look of an accomplished rogue, and is dressed in an expensive silk tunic and pants of a deep blue color. He is also wearing a chainmail jerkin and is armed with a wicked looking sabre.

mobs.name: forest giantess
mobs.description: The forest giantess resembles a huge woman with brown skin and stands nearly fifteen feet tall. Her clothing is of woven vines and leaves. She is armed with a huge spear.

mobs.name: forest giant
mobs.description: The forest giant resembles a huge man with dark brown skin and stands nearly eighteen feet tall. His clothing is of woven vines and leaves. He is armed with a huge spear.

mobs.name: jackal
mobs.description: The jackal looks extremely viscious. It snarls menacingly and bares its teeth at you.

mobs.name: ice elemental
mobs.description: The ice elemental is a titanic humanoid formed of ice.

special_attack.description: discharged a shower of ice shards at

special_ability.description: unleashed a storm of elemental ice
special_ability.name: Attack All and Tumble

mobs.name: flame elemental
mobs.description: The flame elemental is a titanic humanoid formed of flame.

special_attack.description: discharged a cloud of flames at

special_ability.description: unleashed a storm of elemental flame
special_ability.name: Attack All and Tumble

mobs.name: stone elemental
mobs.description: The stone elemental is a titanic humanoid formed of stone.

mobs.name: mystic knight
mobs.description: The mystic knight has the look of a well seasoned warrior who has seen many a battle in his time. His gear and clothing are the finest available. He is wearing glowing dragonscale armor and wielding a jeweled claymore. Somehow you are aware that he could easily defeat you.

mobs.name: orc warrior
mobs.description: The orc warrior is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: orc subchief
mobs.description: The orc subchief is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: orc chieftain
mobs.description: The orc chieftain is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands well over five feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: orc shaman
mobs.description: The orc shaman is a smallish humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. She stands just under five feet in height, is wearing robes, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: orc warlord
mobs.description: The orc warlord is an average sized humanoid with piglike facial features and is covered sparsely by coarse body hair. He stands just under six feet in height, is wearing gleaming chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll warrior
mobs.description: The gnoll warrior is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just under seven feet in height, is wearing chainmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll subchief
mobs.description: The gnoll subchief is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just over seven feet in height, is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll chieftain
mobs.description: The gnoll chieftain is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands just over seven feet in height, is wearing scalemail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll warlord
mobs.description: The gnoll warlord is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick reddish brown body hair. He stands well over seven feet in height, is wearing gleaming bandmail armor, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: gnoll shaman
mobs.description: The gnoll shaman is a tall humanoid with hyenalike facial features and is covered by thick golden brown body hair. She stands just over six feet in height, is wearing robes, and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard warrior
mobs.description: The lizard warrior is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard subchief
mobs.description: The lizard subchief is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard chieftain
mobs.description: The lizard chieftain is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is wearing ringmail armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard warlord
mobs.description: The lizard warlord is a six foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. He has greenish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. He is wearing scalemail armor and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: lizard shaman
mobs.description: The lizard shaman is a five foot tall bipedal humanoid who's features resemble those of a large lizard. She has greyish scaley skin, and sharp claws and teeth. She is wearing robes and is armed with {0} {1}.

mobs.name: stone warrior
mobs.description: The stone warrior is skillfully crafted and resembles a heavily muscled warrior in full plate armor and stands nearly twenty feet high. It is armed with a huge stone axe.

special_ability.description: swings its axe in a wide arc
special_ability.name: Unknown

mobs.name: stone scorpion
mobs.description: The stone scorpion is skillfully crafted and resembles a common scorpion, except that it is nearly twenty feet in length and it's carapace has the color and texture of stone.

special_ability.description: is suddenly surrounded by a pale blue light
special_ability.name: Heal

mobs.name: stone wizard
mobs.description: The stone wizard is skillfully crafted and resembles a gaunt sorceror in flowing robes covered with runes and sigils. It is armed with a stone sceptre topped with a glowing crystal and stands nearly twenty feet high.

mobs.name: dwarven guard
mobs.description: The guard is of obvious dwarven blood. He looks very tough and battle hardened. He wears scale mail armor of a design you're unfamiliar with and wields a battleax.

mobs.name: elite dwarven guard
mobs.description: This guard closely resembles his lesser brethren, however his equipment is of a finer quality and he appears more agressive and well disciplined. He wears brushed steel scale mail armor and wields a huge battleax engraved with runes along the edge of the blade.

mobs.name: dwarven captain
mobs.description: This grim warrior appears to have seen more than his share of battle, and seems utterly fearless. His dwarven mail is of fine quality and each scale has finely engraved runic designs. He wields a battleax with a haft easily four feet long and a blade blacker than night.

mobs.name: dwarven sorceror
mobs.description: The dwarven sorceror has an obvious callousness about his expression, and appears no one to be trifled with. He radiates confidence and power. He wears robes of a deep reddish brown, similar to the hue of the stone in the walls of his home. He carries a black sceptre topped with some sort of softly glowing crystal.

mobs.name: dwarven warhound
mobs.description: The dwarven warhound is a huge beast, nearly four feet at the shoulder. It resembles  a wolf with glossy black fur. Its eyes and teeth are crimson. Its hackles raise and it snarls menacingly as you look its way.

mobs.name: dwarven leutenant
mobs.description: This dwarven officer wears scale armor of the finest quality and brandishes a huge battleaxe of fine make with an extraordinarily keen edge. He seems very dignified and confidant.

mobs.name: dwarven warlord
mobs.description: This ruthless dwarven battle chief is dressed in heavy scale armor made of a dull bluish metal that seems to absorb light. The weapon in his hands is an enormous battleax with a haft of dark grey wood and a head forged of the same strange metal as his armor. Dimly glowing runes adorn the head of his axe along the edges of the blades.

mobs.name: smith
mobs.description: This dwarven smith is heavily muscled, his leather apron smeared with sweat and soot. He is very alert and has an expression of great calm and peace of mind. His eyes harden as he notices your intense stare, and he hefts the weight of his great hammer.

mobs.name: master smith
mobs.description: This older dwarf is gnarled and bulging with muscle. His leathers smeared with grime and sweat. He seems very calm and at one with his surrounds. The great hammer he cradles in his arms is forged of a dull bluish metal, and almost seems to glow dimly.

mobs.name: dwarven archmage
mobs.description: The dwarven archmage has an obvious callousness about his expression, and appears no one to be trifled with. He radiates incredible power. He wears robes of a deep purple hue. He carries a black sceptre topped with some sort of brightly glowing crystal.

mobs.name: hellhound
mobs.description: The hellhound is a large wolf-type creature that dwells in the firey depths of the volcano.  It glares at you with devilish red eyes, mentally feeding you to its young.  It moves with a certain strut that airs its pride and seems to taunt you with its vicious grin.

mobs.name: magma slug
mobs.description: The magma slug is a gigantic slug that is covered in magma.  Its maw rumbles with fury as it looks to burn you alive with its own magma.

mobs.name: elven scout
mobs.description: The elven scout peers at you through its forest green eyes.  The stripes painted on his face warn you that he has come across and slain many an unexpecting traveller.  Your doom awaits.

mobs.name: female elf
mobs.description: Despite being female, this elf resembles a modern-day war machine. She moves blindingly fast, striking at any possible moment.  Though a good fight is her forte, she is also amazingly beautiful, as female elves always seem to be.

mobs.name: elven warrior
mobs.description: This elven warrior is built like a tree, and oddly enough blends in with the trees as well, a warrior of a stealthy sort.  He wields an axe that must have been crafted by the dwarves and enchanted by the high elves.  He is certainly a force to be reckoned with.

mobs.name: elven champion
mobs.description: This elven champion is built like a mountain.  There seems to be no escape from this warrior of warriors, a man's man -- only an elf. He wields a great sword that shines like the moons on a good night. Only the most powerful elves can craft such a beast.

mobs.name: elven warlord
mobs.description: This elven warlord is about to knock some sense into you with his warhammer.  His evil eyes seem to hypnotize you into giving in to your imminent death.
